overview: Arianna Gonz√°lez, new to Chicago, finds herself alone in the big city. Bella Judge, estranged from her family, struggles to find her place in life. Both women find solace in the company of their elderly German neighbor with a penchant for embracing the lost and lonely. Her otherworldly flat becomes the centerpiece as the women live the seasons of their lives.
title: Woman of a Certain Sage
